title: There's Something About a Rebel...
description: Lissa Sanderson is at an all-time low—so why does her brother's gorgeous, brooding best friend have to come back into her life now? Even worse, the teenage crush she once had on Blake Everett is back with a vengeance, despite his scandalous reputation and the fact the former navy officer would clearly prefer to be left alone.Only, now she's a woman. And Blake's not quite so immune to her as he makes out. There's definitely something about a rebel—and Lissa's going to enjoy finding out just what that "something" might be!
author: Anne Oliver
